All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Coach
Coach represents a user who is also a Member in this system.
CoachController
Handles what the coach can do in the application.
CoachGUI
CoachGUI is main screen shown to users with the Coach role.
CommonConstraints
This class contains constants that are used across multiple parts of the application, such as: - Database login details - Host and port info - A full DB URL that combines everything above
LoginController
The LoginController class handles the login logic for the application.
LoginDAO
LoginDAO handles the login logic and database access for user authentication.
LoginGUI
LoginGUI is main login window that asks the user for a username and password.
Main
Main class â€“ this is the starting point of the application.
ManagePlayersController
The ManagePlayersPanelController handles communication between ManagePlayersPanel (view - GUI) and ManagePlayersPanelDAO (model layer - DAO).
ManagePlayersDAO
The ManagePlayersPanelDAO class is responsible for fetching player data from the database.
ManagePlayersPanel
The ManagePlayersPanel class is a Swing JPanel that allows coaches to view and update player information, specifically player positions.
MatchPerformancePanel
Panel to show match performance details.
Member
Represents a general member of the rugby club.
MemberSecretary
MemberSecretary is main dashboard for Member Secretary.
MemberSecretaryController
The MemberSecretaryController sets up and manages the Member Secretary's part of the system.
MemberSecretaryGUI
MemberSecretaryGUI is main GUI window for Member Secretary role.
MembershipType
 
Player
Represents a player in the rugby club.
PlayerPerformanceController
This class handles the logic for player performance.
PlayerPerformanceDAO
PlayerPerformanceDAO is responsible for handling all database operations related to player performance data.
PlayerPerformancePanel
This panel lets coaches view how a player has performed in training.
ReassignmentPanel
Panel to show match reassignment details.
RegisterController
Handles the registration logic for new members.
RegisterDAO
This class handles the database operations related to user registration.
RegisterPanel
This panel intend to allow new users to register in the system.
SessionManager
SessionManager is a utility class used to store the session information of the currently logged-in user.
Skill
 
SkillDevelopmentController
Controller class for SkillDevelopmentPanel.
SkillDevelopmentDAO
SkillDevelopmentDAO handles all DB queries related to skill development features.
SkillDevelopmentPanel
This is the main panel where coaches can rate player skills during training.
SkillPerformanceGraph
This class builds and returns line chart panel showing Player skill level progression over time.
SkillPerformanceGraphController
This controller helps create a dataset for drawing skill performance charts.
SkillPerformanceGraphDAO
This class is responsible for retrieving skill performance data from the database.
Squad
This class represents a Squad (team) in the rugby system.
SquadDAO
 
Staff
This class represents a staff member in the system.
StaffRole
 
TrainingRecordPanel
Panel to show training record details.
ViewMatchHistoryPanel
Panel to view match history details.
